Related Character(s): 㭉, 釪, 鏵
Связанный символ (и): 㭉, 釪, 铧

釫字的基本解释

釫
huá
古同“铧”，耕地起土的农具。

釫
wū
古同“圬”。

釫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huá］
［《廣韻》户花切，平麻，匣。］
铧。耕田起土的农具。一说为“釘”字之讹。

釫字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　釫； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1297第01
【廣韻】戸花切【集韻】胡瓜切，?音華。【廣韻】兩刃臿也。　又【集韻】時遮切，音闍。義同。　又洪孤切，音胡。泥鏝也。塗工之具。本作鋘。　又【廣韻】哀都切【集韻】汪胡切，?音烏。義同。

釫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
釫字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Stupid
huá
In ancient times, "Hua" is a farm tool used to raise soil from cultivated land.
Stupid
wū
Ancient Tong "圬".
Stupid
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huá]
["Guangyun" household flower cut, flat hemp, box. ]
spade. Farm tools for plowing the field. One said that it is an error of the word "nail".
Stupid
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　釫; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 1297 01
[Guang Yun] Flower Cut [Ji Yun] Courgette cut,? Yinhua. [Guang Yun] Two-edged swords also.　[Jiyun] Shizhaqi, Yincha. The same meaning.　Hong Guqie again, Yinhu. The mud trowel also. Paint tools. This is for 鋘.　[Guang Yun] Aidu cut [Ji Yun] Wang Hu cut,? Yinwu. The same meaning.
